item.title: The Static Site Guide
item.description: This is a book about creating and publishing static websites using HTML, CSS, and the Hugo static site generator. It’s still a work in progress, but you can read the completed chapters here. Matt Cone is a technical writer at Fastly and the author of The Markdown Guide.

item.title: victrixsoft/bashbro: A Bash-based web file browser. Allowing you to browse,
item.description: A Bash-based web file browser. Allows you to remotely browse, view documents and save files via your web browser. When using Chrome browser localhost may be blocked, in that case you can use your ip for instance 192.168.1.55:8880 - no tickets on this plz, it's a Windows/Chrome thing.

item.title: Cohere | The leading AI platform for enterprise
item.description: Our customizable, high-performance language models work on public, private, or hybrid clouds to ensure data security & exceptional support. Cohere models are pre-trained on billions of words, making our API easy to use and customize.

item.title: KeyTube 楽曲分析＆ゲーム
item.description: KeyTubeへようこそ 110798曲の楽曲、13041組のアーティストの音域などの楽曲分析と歌詞タイピングゲームなどの楽曲ゲームのサイトです 人気楽曲から探す ライラック アイドル ケセラセラ 唱 さよーならまたいつか!- Sayonara オ
